name: Turtle Splash
description:
You were on the beach, minding your own business when you came across a beach shore full of turtles. Put all the turtles back into the ocean, but make sure you don't join them!

Made with Clickteam fusion:

https://www.clickteam.com/

splash sfx:

https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/splash/

Collecting turtle sfx:

https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/coin/
